Headline: #12 Roosevelt Temporary Reroute at Roosevelt/Western
ShortDescription: 12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt, Western, Ogden and Roosevelt over normal route: due to, police activity near Roosevelt/Western.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt, Western, Ogden and Roosevelt over normal route: due to, police activity near Roosevelt/Western.

Allow extra travel time.
